website_summaries.verdict: A great universal fitting cover that is budget-friendly as well. If you can't find a brand/model specific cover, this is a safe bet.
pros: Heavy duty fabric protects the grill from weather like rain and wind along with harmful UV light
The cover folds up out of the way when not in use
cons: Quality control can be hit or miss depending on the exact cover sent

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover - no need to spend a ton of money
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase a grill cover on Amazon after the last one was basically a nylon tent, that covered my grill fine, but would tear very easily. This grill cover has a thick high quality material, Velcro closure, and I knew just from the handy storage bag it came with this was a well designed cover. Through windy storms it has stayed in tact and in place. Easy on and off by one person only (some are so fidgety you need two people like making king size bed) Very happy with this cover so far! Once it survives through the winter months I will give it 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Loo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my previous cover because it fell apart after one season, and I can tell this one is built to last. It is very thick material with strong seams. The extra weight also resists the wind blowing it off. Negatives: it's built slightly too long for the grill height so it drags the floor when moving the grill with the cover on, and the velcro straps are too close together so it doesn't cinch the bottom as well as it should. Still recommended though.
customer_reviews.author: JoelR

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, I had put it on my grill
customer_reviews.text: The BBQ cover arrived JUST IN TIME and very quickly. We had a snow/sleet/rain storm the night I received the cover. Fortunately, I had put it on my grill, so all was safe. It is exactly what I needed. The size is a little roomy for my Weber, but it makes it easy to slip on and off - unlike the old cover I had. Very strong, water-proof material makes it ideal for a grill that lives outside on the patio all through a Jackson, WY winter.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Burke

customer_reviews.title: Durable Grill Cover, and Customer Support at Tadge is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable grill cover, and it has protected my grill well during both hot and cold seasons. After many months, however, it developed an issue...it had faded a bit. I contacted Tadge to see if they could help me with the issue. The customer support rep (David) was prompt, courteous, and provided excellent customer service. The issue was resolved quickly, and exceeded my expectations...in fact, I couldn’t ask for a better, customer-focused response! I really appreciate the way David handled my request...I’d recommend others purchase from this company, and in the event there is a problem with an item, contact Tadge directly about it to receive top-shelf customer support!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes inclimate weather like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I inherited a bbq grill that was so ginormous, that I could never find a cover that fit. Tadge Goods BBQ Grill Cover w/Handles (58” Black) Waterproof, Heavy Duty came to the rescue. This cover is a beast. It ties at the bottom, to keep critters and the snow out. Left the grill out all winter, and the cover acted like a champ. The only complaint is that the beautiful black color faded due to the hot summer sun. But I will not complain in the least. Using the grill now, but know that it is will be protected when the snow and wind hits the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Ida McCarty

customer_reviews.title: It just made our whole deck look sad sitting out there
customer_reviews.text: The original cover for our grill had faded and ripped severely within two years of purchase. It just made our whole deck look sad sitting out there. I ordered this one, hoping it would be decent, since the price was fantastic, and it totally exceeded our expectations. My husband even made a point of saying how nice it was, and he's not one to notice that kind of thing.
customer_reviews.author: JosieF

customer_reviews.title: It is just OK.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for just over a year and it definitely is not waterproof. It is water resistant. We are always draining water from our grease trap after rain and snow. It faded quite a bit in the year and is ripping on the lower edges. We have this located on a well ventilated deck with quite a bit of shade and protection from 2 sides. I would have expected at least 2 years from this and was shocked when my husband said we needed a new one so soon. I am not overly concerned with fading, but ripping and water coverage still should not be an issue. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Neen

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill cover
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the cover and impressed with the outreach of the company, checking to be sure that I received it in a timely manner and that I am satisfied. The cover appears to be a very durable material and has handles which aid in the removal. Velcro tabs at the bottom keep it securely on the grill, but the weight of the cover itself seems more than adequate to keep it in place. Also, the cover fits well and completely covers the grill. I would definitely order it again. In fact , I just did! I bought another one for our vacation property!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Elliott

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. It's heavy duty and fits our bbq ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It's heavy duty and fits our bbq perfectly (measurements provided online were exactly correct). I also appreciate the velcro straps at the bottom of each side to keep it stable against wind and dry when raining. Finally, I am so glad you put your logo front and center on the cover!!! Our last cover was all black so I was always messing up as to which way went which. I ended up using some green tape and applied it to the front of the cover in the shape of two arrows pointing down. It looked pretty tacky!!! Thanks for creating such a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very long
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews that it was long, I just didn't realize how long! This thing is huge. The good thing is that it goes over the grill completely. It is so long that if it rains, you'll need to go out and get the water out of the bottom of the cover. The velcro tabs are so close to ground level that it makes it a little bit of a pain. It does protect the grill and it could certainly be a one size fits all if we ever need to replace the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Whispurrs

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up over time (about 1 year only)
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for our pellet grill with the attached propane grill on the side. It fit well and covered the whole grill. The Velcro ties along each side didn’t really close tight enough as designed. This product seemed good when we received it, but faded drastically after only a few months outside. Around the 11 month mark, the material started to split in several places and we have had to use duct tape to keep it together. We would not buy this again, and are now looking for a different cover as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: SmallTownGirl

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and nicely flexible.
customer_reviews.text: I like to grill occasionally even during the dead of a mid-western winter. I'm not yet sure how this cover will winter but I will surly find out in the coming months. Fits my grill very nicely and is true to the size dimensions given. The last cover I had was so stiff to begin with that it cracked during the cold winter months. It got down to 25 F last night and this cover remained very flexible so I am hopeful that will be still be the case when the temperature really tanks.
customer_reviews.author: Usalf

customer_reviews.title: Lasts awhile, inexpensive to replace.
customer_reviews.text: We've had ours for over 2 years now. Our grill is in the open yard, being beaten by the FL sun. It started fading quickly, about 3 months in, however it was still perfectly fine until recently. We noticed it was becoming brittle after about 18 months and it finally ripped today (2 yrs, 3 mos). I ordered another one because the cover is inexpensive enough. I've tried other, more expensive covers that ripped within a year of the heavy sun damage. Spending $20 every other year is acceptable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tryphenakyra

customer_reviews.title: High quality, heavy duty, and a surprising price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, heavy duty, fits perfectly. I was very surprised by the heavy materials used and the overall size of the product. If you look at the first picture on their product page, that is exactly the fit for my grill. There is a little slack, which helps when you put the cover back on, but no so much that it slides around at all. The velcro straps hold well, and the handles are a nice touch. I looked at covers in the big box stores, and it was half the quality at twice the price so I gave this product a chance. You should too.
customer_reviews.author: Kayakin Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a month and a half
customer_reviews.text: After only a month and a half of use - taking it off/putting it one about 4-5 times - the seam on one of the straps came loose, causing the strap to fall off in my hand. Granted it had been hot and humid, but I would expect more from a product marketed as “weatherproof.” Very disappointed in this product and will not be buying the same brand to replace this one - even the Kmart special I replaced with this one lasted 2 years before the straps frayed (not fell off). On a positive note, it does seem to be waterproof, as stated, as we had some heavy rains and the grill was 100% dry underneath of it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Burtleton

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Char Broil RED at half the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement cover for my Char Broil RED and honestly did not think that the "official" Char Broil RED that I had before was worth anywhere close to what they are asking. So I decided to give this a try. Not only does it feel heavier duty, it actually fits better than the one made for the grill. Honestly the ONLY thing I do not like is the logo on the thing. Wish they would just make it smaller. However at $20, not going to complain.
customer_reviews.author: Clintre

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two winters in Michigan
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality cover. The velcro to fasten it wasn't very effective, so we rigged something up ourselves. The material was fairly waterproof. We live in Michigan, and the grill is in an area with lots of wind and gets snow in the winter. This made it through two whole winters, however, after a recent windstorm the cover was ripped in half. I believe the material got stiff and brittle. Not bad overall considering the price, but will buy another brand for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Okay Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as I thought it would be, but at $20 if it last 2 seasons it's worth it It does fit my Nextgrill inferred 5 burner grill nicely with velcro straps on the bottom to snug it up , ad pull handles to remove i. all in all not a bad cover, just don't expect it to last forever ! The last cover i bought from amazon did not even last 6 months and was faded and cracking and leaking !
customer_reviews.author: Springer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased cover August 2018. After 11 months service, cover is faded. Removed cover from grill right after a shower of rain and grill as wet as it would have been without cover. Described as colorfast, waterproof etc. Guess that is all true for a few weeks then down hill from there. I understand at the price point, guess get what You pay for...... Would not recommend if expecting to last more than 6 months as described...
customer_reviews.author: KYsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 4-year-old Coleman cover (that should have been replaced a year ago) with the Tadge Goods cover. The quality of the Tadge puts the Coleman cover to shame. Needless to say, it's too early to determine how long this cover will last, but it is heavy weight and looks like it will last more years than the Coleman. The price was right also.
customer_reviews.author: GaryR6061

customer_reviews.title: Strong material
customer_reviews.text: Simply put: we had a very bad wind storm that caused a lot of damage, including the beach road washing out, part of my roof blowing off, and my patio furniture cover blowing off. But my Tadge Goods BBQ Grill cover DID NOT BLOW OFF. It didn't tear either (which my patio furniture cover did). Happy happy....worth a little extra to get such great quality!
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Hartvig-Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cover!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought a grill cover from one of the box stores. It was fine, and lasted a couple of years. I thought this cover would be similar - but I was wrong. This is a really nice, heavy-duty cover that I suspect will hold up to our long winter. I never expected it to be this nice for the price. Mine is a four burner grill, with tables on both sides and the cover fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Orend

customer_reviews.title: cheap price, durable as can be!
customer_reviews.text: I lucked out and caught this on a flash sale for CHEAP!! My old grill cover was falling apart and the price on this was worth the risk of it falling apart after a month---I wasn't paying $100+ for a grill cover by Weber. This cover is high quality and beyond a little sun fading (direct sun throughout the summer months), it has help up through winds and a LOT of rainy summer days. It did not rot out like other cheaper materials. I expect this cover to last through NJ winters and summers for a few more years.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of this cover when it arrived. We had purchased our last two locally and they didn't last long because they were essentially just plastic. This is a canvas top with a plastic liner. Very nice looking and smooch more durable and able to withstand the winds. Also I love the velcro tightener to hold it on! No more zip ties or ropes!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Collins Orea

customer_reviews.title: Color faded to light gray...
customer_reviews.text: Same with the other reviewers, the color faded to light gray. It looks dirty even after cleaning it. It serves its purpose as protection from the rain and sun but I’m not happy with the faded color. Time to throw it away and buy another brand. Hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: conn

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The new grill cover is very high quality and a great value for the money. I go through grill covers every couple of years so I’ll see how long this one will last. It’s off to a good start and stayed on my grill securely during the winds of hurricane Irma as it came through the metro Atlanta area. Nice work!
customer_reviews.author: Mike R

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I was initially happy with the cover until I realized water was going right through it. When I take if off the grill after a rain, the grill is soaked. It also faded severely in under 1 year. The much more expensive Weber grill covers fit properly, they are waterproof and they don't fade anywhere near as fast.
customer_reviews.author: PghHLT

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy grill cover.
customer_reviews.text: Great big sturdy looking grill cover, makes the grill look like a passing locomotive. You can hear that lonesome whistle blow. Slips on and off easily and completely covers to the ground. Price was very reasonable. Now I need one for my green egg. No idea how it holds up to northeast weather. Get back to you in 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: TalkCineman

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality and a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Havent6eveb been using 2 months and it already has a number of holes in it. Complete waste of money as I need a cover to protect bbq from moisture. This is useless and a complete waste of money. Unfortunately, the holes all came after the return period expired.
customer_reviews.author: APSC

customer_reviews.title: I love this grill cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill cover. My husband had one for our old grill and it shredded after just a couple rains. We've been using this one all summer and it has held up very nicely so far! It's quite easy to put on and take off. Looking forward to seeing how it holds up this winter, but I have no doubts that it will do great
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Chapman

customer_reviews.title: One-Year Review:  Faded to Gray
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to stumble upon this grill cover after multiple fails with other brands leaving us with ripped and shredded messes after a few months. While the cover has remained intact, the black has faded to gray on the sun exposed side making it look less than appealing. If they could treat the fabric with some sort of color-fast sealant this would be an excellent product
customer_reviews.author: N. Ahdarp

customer_reviews.title: Best grill cover!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of a Father’s Day gift for my husband! He loved it! Works great, endures the Texas heat and rain proof! It stays on even in high winds which we have here because it has fasteners at the bottom to tighten it! Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.author: Yanna B.

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This cover does not last long at all, it has deteriorated so that we had to toss it. The material was really effected by the weather, something you would not expect from a weatherproof cover. This being said I would not purchase a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: RWH

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality and Sturdy Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: The weight is good and the workmanship sturdy. This is the first grill cover we've had that stands up to extreme weather. The strong cloth and waterproof backing are far more effective than flimsy plastic or vinyl covers. In Arizona sun, black does turn to gray within a year but who cares when the cover is sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Bolender

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy cover
customer_reviews.text: We actually use this grill cover to cover our small chicken coop, to protect it from weather. Works great. I like this grill cover because it's made from a material that feels like it won't shred after a winter season. Our first cover totally deteriorated after one year. Our hens are grateful for this!
customer_reviews.author: Trystan Marl Greist

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy....fades way to fast.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this since last December. I didn’t put the grill back outside, I live in Wisconsin, until May. So that’s when I first put the cover on my Weber Grill. My grill is in only partial sun during the afternoon. I must say I am very disappointed on how much this cover has faded. It looks gray now instead of black. You would think it’s ten years old!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia r lackie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality cover that fits our grill perfectly. The last one we had (different brand) was just too big even though the description showed the same dimensions. It lasted about 3 months before it became horribly faded and gray. This one is thinker and based on the fabric I have high hopes that the color won't fade.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine J.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product, keeps the grill dry in the snow and rain. However, I would like to make a recommendation, replacing the velcro straps with something a bit more sturdy/tie-down-able would be a nice improvement. The velcro just seems a bit week and feels like it could come apart in high winds. Besides that one thought it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: BBQ Gas Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value vinyl cover that protects my propane gas grill from the elements. The cover comes in different sizes so you need to measure out the length, width, and height of your grill. It came in a zipper vinyl pouch. For the quality, value and presentation I gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KMax

customer_reviews.title: This is made of good materials that last outside year round
customer_reviews.text: This is made of good materials that last outside year round. It fit a little tighter than I would have thought, but I have the side burner and a shelf on other side, so if your BBQ is smaller this should work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Schlutter

customer_reviews.title: Great grill cover!
customer_reviews.text: This grill cover is awesome. Good quality and fast shipping. Based on the price of other grill cover made by the same company that made our grill, I honestly assumed this would be poor quality. But I took a chance and it worked out. We saved money and it’s a nice quality cover. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: LoveAK

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable and Effective
customer_reviews.text: We live in a very rainy and windy part of the country, and this grill cover has been absolutely amazing! Our grill has no weather damage to it, and the cover is very easy to remove and re-cover at any time. It doesn't crinkle up and keeps its shape for easy use. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: all that fun stuff. It's starting to fade from the sun ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds up to Wyoming weather. That means 65+ MPH winds, hail, snow, all that fun stuff. It's starting to fade from the sun a little, but that doesn't really bother me as long as it stays together like this.
customer_reviews.author: Thad H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: outstanding cover at a good price. thick and durable, not like the cheap plastic-type covers I have had in the past. a little long, and the wheels can get caught when pulling the covered grill. when it is off the grill, it does not fold up and make it harder to figure out which way to install. 5 stars! love it!
customer_reviews.author: Billy1

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy grill cover
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this grill cover. Fit our Weber spirit perfectly. Material is thick and sturdy. Looks like it will last a long time! Price point is awesome also. We bought this to replace our Weber grill cover which was falling apart. This material doesn’t look like it will do that. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Brown

customer_reviews.title: So far ... love this cover
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well built and easily fits my grill. Had it for 6 months and it still looks new. It gets hit with intense Virginia sun and coastal winds ... my last cover (different brand) lasted only 18 months before it shredded. I'll update this review when/if that happens. But so far, this has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Tadge Goods BBQ Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and fits my grill perfectly. Rating is for the fit and appearance. Unable to comment on durability and material quality, but will follow up after a summer in the California valley heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: Love my Taste grill cover. Fits well and I believe it will be able to stand up to a Colorado winter. It is very well made. I also felt like the company really cared about it's customers. I got an email thanking me for buying It! It has very strong Velcro so that it doesn't fly off in a wind storm. (Boulder gets strong winds and it has already survived)
customer_reviews.author: LYDIA PELLOW

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the thickest quality material but it seems to get the job done and hasn’t ripped yet or began to fade. We’ll see how it holds up in the summer sun. But definitely a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D'Erasmo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material, poor fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very impressed by this when it arrived. The quality of the material for the cost exceeded my expectations. Since putting it on my grill, I've been disappointed with the fit. Keep in mind that I have a standard grill (Home Depot special), so the specs are extremely common. Any who, the cover has continued to slip for fly right off. I've taken additional steps to secure the cover, but its kinda a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Piece of Crap.
customer_reviews.text: Within three months one of the Velcro straps broke - okay so I will use a clip. Within six months the grill cover lost it's color and turned almost white -- not a big deal but it bothers my wife. Now the fabric is beginning to fall apart and there are thread-bare holes in the cover everywhere. I don't understand how this cover can get 4 1/2 stars, unless the people submit the review when they first get the cover. Fact is, in less than a year it becomes unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Hine from NC

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We did receive the cover and it looks like it should last quite a while. Good sturdy construction, much heavier than the last one we had. Thanks for offering a good product at a good price. Thanks again for the help! Great looking product, excellent follow-up from the maker to see if I was happy with the product. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Noyes

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, feels rugged to the touch. Came in a heavy clear package, fit my grill perfectly. The upcoming New England winter will put it through a tough test, my guess is it will be fine. I've never purchased one this heavy and the price was very reasonable. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Mac

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight cover; great value
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Weber gas grill perfectly. Feels heavyweight and sturdy. Velcro straps at the bottom to help cinch the bottom and keep it from flapping in the wind. Much better quality than I expected, especially at this price point. I really expected this would be a sort of temporary fix until I could find a nicer cover. Happy to be wrong. This is a great heavy cover that should last us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Knox

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 burner Weber grill, and as a replacement for the $19.99 Lowe's version, which tore and ripped within a few weeks. Good construction and flex to the material, which helps on those colder winter days when I grill. Fits nicely, and if anything a bit large for my grill, but that is a minor point. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Char Broil User here
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have a char broil gas2coal grill and this cover I awesome. It’s alittle larger than the actual grill itself but the two side valcro scraps let the cover fit snug. I live in sunny California so only UV and dust is a problem.. my grill was looking good and ready to use today after a few weeks in storage. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Al Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cover. Fits good on my kitchen Aid bbq
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover. Fits good on my kitchen Aid bbq. The fit is more on the looser side , and is easier to throw on. It has Velcro straps to pull it snugger together at the bottom.i just had a rainy and stormy past few days and it stayed on secured.the cover is pretty sturdy for 20 bucks and looks great.hopefully it out lasts my original cover, but if not it was only 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy The Greek

customer_reviews.title: With the extra feature of Velcro straps to tighten the bottom of the cover great idea. Your service and quality deserves a 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: A five star is definitely what your company deserves. I ordered this item this past Saturday the 21rst of October at night with a promised delivery of the 25th of October. To my pleasant surprise it arrived that Monday the 23rd. The quality of the product is very similar to what you would get when you are buying the cover for popular named propane BBQ grills; With the extra feature of Velcro straps to tighten the bottom of the cover great idea. Your service and quality deserves a 5 star. I would recommend to my friends. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ierke

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this cover for 7 months now and it has been extremely durable in the rain, sun and high winds. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for durability in a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 burner Sears grill and with side burner and shelf on the left side. This fits easily over my grill. It's lightweight and pliable as well as waterproof. I've only had it over my grill this spring so far but am pleased. The real test will be the New England winter this coming year. But for the price I feel it's exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and fits my grill perfectly. We'll see how durable this is after an outdoor winter exposure....my other ones didn't last much more than 2 or 3 seasons with severe fading and ripping at corners with side grill/table.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: This cover is made of very low quality fabric and the stitching and seams are even cheaper. I will be surprised if this cover lasts one season. Garbage. Update:. Didn't last. The fabric is EXTREMELY faded and crisp. Tears form from moving the cover as it is so dried out. Not meant to weather the elements. Worst cover.
customer_reviews.author: The Critic

customer_reviews.title: Durable, heavy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very heavy and durable material. I should have bought this the first time instead of a cheap on that ripped. This cover is great and is a thick woven material that won’t rip or snag. We have bad wind here and every other cover usually blows off. This one doesn’t budge. I’m really glad I bought this one!
customer_reviews.author: Erin1983

customer_reviews.title: Color fades but it protects my bbq grill.
customer_reviews.text: Cover works well to protect from rain and moisture. It has velcro to keep the base snug. Only negative is that it fades from black to dull gray when exposed to the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: kinda useless since the cover is meant to be on a ...
customer_reviews.text: A little too big for my BBQ Grill - but it's an Universal Cover, Came with its own Storage Bag (?), kinda useless since the cover is meant to be on a grill, good quality and thick material with a padded interior.
customer_reviews.author: Yev K

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the Tadge Grill Cover recently and am completely ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Tadge Grill Cover recently and am completely impressed with the quality of the cover, the durability and the look of it. Tadge Goods is a company dedicated to customer satisfaction, which can sometimes be hard to find. I will not hesitate to do business with them again. I appreciate the attention to detail in the follow up I recieved and the speed in which I recieved my cover. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: eileen dierks

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed at the quality of this cover
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I know this is just a grill cover, but having just purchased a cheap, thin plastic one from Home Depot a couple of weeks before, I am amazed at the quality of this cover. Truly. I find it hard to believe it was only $20!! Thick canvas-like construction with handles and cinching tabs, this thing is perfect! Truthfully, I would pay double the price this product. I love a deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Middlemass

customer_reviews.title: It's working so far...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call Florida harsh weather but we do get a lot of rain, humidity and bugs. So far this cover has kept my grill looking almost new since October. It's pretty easy to remove and put back on. I'm sure I need to use the tie downs on the bottom but I never do. So far so good....
customer_reviews.author: QuyDaddi

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Just received this cover. Came in great shape with no issues. Fit’s my grill great. The material feels sturdy and thick which I think will hold up to the weather. I will revisit this review after some rain and the cover sitting in the sun. I’m excited so far with the product itself
customer_reviews.author: DAVID RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Not bad just doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 years out of it; well just under 2 really. I would have expected longer maybe that is good but I feel 3-5gets you good. Became very brittle
customer_reviews.author: MEB

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof as advertised, seller resolved issue immediately.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is not waterproof as advertised. First rainfall went right through it. Update: seller immediately resolved the issue with a refund explaining that the delivered product was defective. Updated to 5 stars for excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Drange

customer_reviews.title: Good, at first.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this at first, but sadly it didn’t withstand the sun and tore in multiple places. Looks nice and lasted a year. Would love to get it replaced and update my review!
customer_reviews.author: Leea Z

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I must confess I use one on my gas grill on done on my pellet smoker and a 3 rd on my yamaha boat motor. Works fantastic and very good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Judy gaghyan

customer_reviews.title: Grill cover that won't blow away on windy days.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the thickness of the material. It appears to be tear resistant and it is heavy enough to stay put on windy days. I am very pleased with this grill cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence D Eden

customer_reviews.title: great bbq cover
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a month. I've taken it off and on a few times and its easy to remove and put back on. Seems to hold up to the outdoor elements so far. Time will tell but am very pleased with this purchase. Much better than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Fades? Sure, but STILL worth it
customer_reviews.text: So, Ive seen people complain about it fading from black to gray. This is true, HOWEVER this cover is VERY rugged. Every cover Ive bought in a store gets torn to hell in no time at all, but this cover is super-durable. For as durable as this product is I can live with a gray cover. And once it fades it looks like it was bought that way.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Frodo

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Fits my grill perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Fits my grill perfectly, material can withstand all weathers conditions (so far it has survived snow, rain, ice, and small hail). Don't have experience yet if the color or quality fades due to exposure to sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Update: we bought this grill cover in February and it has already badly faded by August. It is now a spotty grey and black cover. The protection is still there but it is becoming unsightly. Great grill cover. Fabric feels heavier than any cover we’ve had. It also fits properly around the sides to hold it on really secure. We attached a hook to our fence and hang the cover from the side handles while we are grilling. Totally recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Pie and Cake

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The grill is only two burner so the cover is large. It is thick, soft and has a weave appearance. It includes handles for removing the cover and Velcro straps. Happy with it. Time will tell how long it survives.
customer_reviews.author: BJK

customer_reviews.title: Appears well made and delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: Item fits perfectly and appears well made with seams well constructed. It says its waterproof - we'll find out but is doinf well so far. Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: The velcro straps are nicely placed toward the bottom to keep the wind from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality cover at a very reasonable price. The velcro straps are nicely placed toward the bottom to keep the wind from blowing it off. The handles, the first I've seen on a grill cover, are a real plus. Highly recommend the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Gary MG

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I took a look at a lot of grill covers before I stumbled upon the Tadge Goods BBQ Grill Cover. I took a chance on it and couldn’t be happier! It’s a great value and is very well designed/constructed. It fits my grill perfectly! I was also pleased that the vendor (Tadge Goods) followed-up with my purchase to check that I was completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well and good price
customer_reviews.text: I like how well the cover fits the grill. I would recommend to the seller to consider an extra stitch around the seams for some added durability which reflects a 4 instead of 5 star rating. We haven't had to withstand a lot of wind yet but so far with basic rain it is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: It fit!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large grille that measures the exact dimensions of this cover. It fitted perfectly. Will re-evaluate a couple of months down the road if something changes.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Gasca

customer_reviews.title: Good grill cover
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this grill cover a couple of weeks and so far, so good. It does what it says it'll do. I received it on time in good condition. I hope that helps.
customer_reviews.author: cn500

customer_reviews.title: It fades
customer_reviews.text: Bought this grill cover 10 months ago and it has faded a lot. My grill is under a covered patio. When it eventually falls apart I will research and buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a good value!
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a cover for my BBQ, the last one tore at every corner. The Tadge cover arrived, I put it on, just the feel of the material had substance to it. We then experienced 60mph winds for two days, it looks exactly as it did the day I put on. I think this is a good value!
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: its ok. I notice after a month its already ...
customer_reviews.text: its ok. I notice after a month its already fading. spent the extra money cause a lot of reviews say it doesn't. Not so much the case. Other than that it does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Swartout

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this new grill cover after having a horrible experience with one bought at Home Depot (it lasted about a year and was supposedly "heavy-duty."). So far, so good. This one by Tadge has stood up to our unusual amount of rain here in Los Angeles. If I can get to next year, I'll be happy! Looks good so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: Short product life
customer_reviews.text: Mine got ripped after 9 months and the color washed out from black to light grey. False advertisement of quality. Won't buy this brand anymore. Fit and water resistance seemed good hence the 2 star
customer_reviews.author: SHG

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat sturdy. Ability to adjust size at bottom could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Good overall but has already ripped through on one corner. May not the products fault as area where BBQ grill is at is very windy. Would have preferred ties or adjustable clips over velcro at bottom because velcro doesn't allow for much adjustment, so ended up tieing the velcro together.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Timmons

customer_reviews.title: It is indeed a "heavy" duty cover.
customer_reviews.text: Even I opened the shipping box, it feels heavy than all other covers I've bought in the past. It turns out it is made of a nice thick waterproof material, with quality works. It fits perfect to my grill. Let's see if it last more than a couple of seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality material, heavy duty, easy on the wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the cover. Ive only had it for a short time but it's already served it's purpose well. It's well manufactured, heavy duty fabric, the handles are placed such that it lifts seemlessly off my grill. The Velcro straps are helpful but not as much as I thought they would be. Probably be better on a wider grill.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Grill cover wont let you down
customer_reviews.text: Hello, this week kind of flew by but unlike the grill cover that I put on. We got snow and strong winds and the cover didnt go anywhere with the great velcro straps holding everything tight and dry with the durable material. It was definitely a great buy and cheaper than the cover thats the same brand as the grill. Thank you for the cover and following up on your product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: not great find
customer_reviews.text: Have had many grill covers before, even high quality expensive ones. They always seem to rip at the edges of the grill with high winds. Not this one! Update: grill cover weathers easily in the sun. Falls apart in less than 2 years. Need a new one now! :( Is it worth the cost replacing yearly? Downgraded from 5 stars to 3
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product would recomed it to a friend
customer_reviews.text: Cover came on time and was good fit. The product seams to be of good quality and will out last the last three from different vender This material is similar to cover I have for my lawn mower that has lasted for several years.
customer_reviews.author: K from Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality and fits my grill completely. In use for two years now and still protecting my grill from the weather elements in AR.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality/Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as scheduled. Excellent quality. Great price. Highly recommend. This is a very high quality grill cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi David!!! Thank you for your email. I appreciate the follow up! The Tadge grill Cover fit perfectly! The dimensions listed were spot on. I was very impressed with the thickness and sturdiness of the fabric. I was very happy that it did come with tabs to tighten. I will definitely be shopping for more Tadge products! Thank you! Thomas Benedict
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Benedict

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a great price. This BBQ grill cover has far exceeded my expectations and I am certain that it will outlast my previous three grill covers combined. Also, this purchase is a strong step in rebuilding my faith in American made products once again.
customer_reviews.author: aintlyon

product_meta.title: Tadge Goods BBQ Grill Cover w/Handles (58” Black) Waterproof, Heavy Duty | Large Universal Weber Charbroil Fit with Strap Fasteners | Gas, Charcoal, Electric
feature_bullets: HEAVY-DUTY GRILL PROTECTION – This black BBQ grill cover blocks UV rays, is colorfast and fade resistant, and protects against rain, sleet, snow, water and more.

WIND-RESISTANT STRAPS FASTENERS – Along with convenient pull handles on top, the bottom of each gas grill cover can secure tightly with built-in straps fasteners to prevent cover from blowing away in strong winds
BRAND VERSATILITY – This charcoal and gas BBQ grill cover fits a wide range of makes, models and brands, including Brinkmann, Char Broil, Weber, Holland and more.
ALL-WEATHER DURABILITY – Crafted with 600D polyester oxford fabric and PVC coating this heavy duty BBQ grill cover is rip resistant, waterproof, sun-safe and weatherproof.
TRUSTED WARRANTY – Every Tadge Goods large BBQ grill cover is reinforced for strength, durability and all-weather resistance; all backed by a risk-free purchase.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,329 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
